snippet: The Village and Town of East Hampton are withdrawing from the federal program after facing boisterous opposition and lawsuits.
abstract: Both Village and Town of East Hampton, LI, have decided to withdraw from program to bring in federal sharpshooters to significantly thin local deer populations after vigorous opposition to idea; developments throw into doubt future of what had been designed as one of largest deer removal efforts ever undertaken by the federal government.
lead_paragraph: The Village and Town of East Hampton are withdrawing from the federal program after facing boisterous opposition and lawsuits.

headline.main: East Hampton Withdraws From Deer-Culling Program
headline.print_headline: East Hampton Withdraws From Deer-Culling Program
